This app demonstrates all parameters of `update_date`:
- `id`: Used in each update call as "demo_date"
- `label`: Updated via the "Update Label" button
- `value`: Updated via the "Update Value" button to tomorrow's date
- `min`: Updated via the "Update Min Date" button to today's date
- `max`: Updated via the "Update Max Date" button to 30 days from today

The app is minimal and includes only necessary components:
1. A single date input
2. Four buttons to demonstrate each parameter update
3. A text output to show the current value
4. No external data files or unnecessary components

Each button triggers a specific update to demonstrate one parameter of `update_date`. The app uses express mode syntax and follows Shiny for Python best practices.
